ARABIC: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَقَٰرُونَ فَقَالُوا۟ سَٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: to Pharaoh, Haman and Qarun. But they said, 'A lying magician.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: To Pharaoh, Haman and Qarun. But they said: "He is only a deceiving sorcerer."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: to Pharaoh and Haman and Korah. They said: “(He is) a sorcerer, an utter liar.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: to the Pharaoh, Haman, and Korah, who said, "He is only a lying magician.".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Towards Firaun and Haman and Qaroon – in response they said, “(He is) a magician, a big liar!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: To Fir`awn, Haman and Qarun, but they called (him): "A sorcerer, a liar!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: To Firon and Haman and Qaroun, but they said: A lying magician.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: to Pharaoh, Haman and Korah; they said, 'A lying sorcerer!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Unto Pharaoh and Haman and Korah, but they said: A lying sorcerer!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: to Pharaoh, Haman and Korah. But they said, "A magician, a liar."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Unto Fir'awn and Haman and Qur'an, but they said: a magician, a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: to Pharaoh, Haman and Korah, but they said, ‘A magician and a mendacious liar.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To Pharaoh, Haman, and Qarun; but they called (him)" a sorcerer telling lies!"...
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: To Fir'aun (Pharaoh), Haman and Qarun (Korah), but they called (him): "A sorcerer, a liar!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: to Pharaoh, Haman, and Korah. But they said: 'A sorcerer, a liar'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To Pharaoh, Hamaan, and Quaroon. But they said, “A lying sorcerer.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: To Pharaoh, Haman and Qarun; but they said, "[He is] a magician and a liar."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:24] to Pharaoh and Hāmān and Korah, but they said — that he was — ‘A sorcerer, a [mere] liar!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Unto Pharaoh and Haman) the aid of Pharaoh (and Korah) Moses' cousin, (but they said) to Moses, this is: (A lying sorcerer) who sows disunity between people!
